game.name: Lotus Challenge
game.desc: Lotus Challenge is a racing game released for Xbox. Get into one of the 38 models of the Lotus range and race around the world. In addition to the latest models, you can drive the brand's first models.

game.name: Mace Griffin : Bounty Hunter
game.desc: Mace Griffin: Bounty Hunter is a first-person shooter released for Xbox. As a bounty hunter, pursue your prey throughout the galaxy and master the 17 weapons available in your arsenal.

game.name: Mad Dash Racing
game.desc:
Mad Dash Racing combines high-speed combat and 3D adventure action with a crew of motley characters for an insane multiplayer competition for up to four. Players select from nine different characters, each with their own unique personality and abilities, and compete in a race for survival against the evil Hex, his dirty minions and your unforgiving friends. Glide across rivers of hot, steaming lava, slip through underwater pipes, bash through mammoth boulders, and slide down icy glaciers to beat the other racers and escape Hex's wicked wrath.
Music by Moby, Fatboy Slim, Propellorheads & More!

game.name: Madagascar
game.desc:
Be a part of Dreamwork's animated adventure by guiding Marty the Zebra, Alex the lion, Melman the giraffe, Gloria the hippo and those stealthy Penguins as they escape the Central Park Zoo into the streets of New York and then into the wild jungle...err San Diego zoo.
The storyline is exactly the same as the movie itself and each chapter will bring you further in the story. Every chapter will have various goals set. Only one specific goal per chapter is required to complete the chapter so you can always replay the chapter later to try to complete all the goals.
Every stage will also require you to play as a different character and some will involve all characters.
Each character have their own unique abilities: Marty can kick with his hind legs, sneak around his enemies slide and perform long-jumps. Alex the lion can throw fruits, use his claws and roar at his enemies. Gloria can tumble, butt bounce and hip check her enemies. And when she eats some chili peppers, she will be able to charge into her enemies. Melman can spin into, throw items at and head bash his enemies. He can also perform the Helicopter move which enables him to glide long distances. Finally the Penguin can slide, fish and attack with a Finishing move (something like a karate chop) to defeat their enemies.
Throughout the game there will be various items to collect including Life Tikis to replenish your Health Meter and Monkey Money that will enable you to buy special things at the Zoovenir Shop like mini games and special outfits for the Madagascar cast.

game.name: Magic : The Gathering : Battlegrounds
game.desc: Magic: The Gathering - Battlegrounds is a real-time fighting/strategy game in which players use Magic: The Gathering cards to combat each other. Three possible types of spells can be played: creatures, sorceries and enchantments.

game.name: Major League Baseball 2k5
game.desc: Major League Baseball 2K5 is an Xbox sports game sponsored by ESPN. The many customisable options allow you to set up the game the way you want it, to compete against other players or even play solo.

game.name: Major League Baseball 2k6
game.desc: Major League Baseball 2K6 on Xbox is a baseball game that features an updated roster for the season. This episode introduces new movement management to make the games even more realistic. There is a Classic mode, Exhibition mode, The Season mode, etc.

game.name: Major League Baseball 2k7
game.desc: Major League Baseball 2K7 on Xbox is a baseball game that features an updated roster for the season. This game introduces a new gameplay system with a new movement management and morale system. The better a player performs, the better his teammates will perform. There is a Classic mode, Exhibition mode, The Season mode, etc.

game.name: Manhunt
game.desc: The year's darkest and most terrifying videogame experience has arrived courtesy of Rockstar Games, makers of the controversial Grand Theft Auto series. Walk in the shoes of James Earl Cash, a man sentenced to death only to find himself given an unexpected and sinister reprieve. Forced to fight and outwit hordes of bloodthirsty gang members vying for his head on a platter. All orchestrated for pleasure and profit by the voice of an unseen Director. This is a brutal bloodsport.

game.name: Marvel Nemesis : L'Avenement des Imparfaits
game.desc:
When New York City is attacked by aliens, the greatest heroes (and villains) in the Marvel Universe confront them. Marvel Nemesis has two playing modes, a single-player story mode, where players brawl their way through a Mark Millar scripted tale, and a single- or two-player versus mode pitting heroes and villains against each other in a sandbox arena.
Famous Marvel characters have been reimagined by artist Jae Lee and new characters have been created for this game series. The PS2 and Xbox versions support online play and all versions have unlockable arenas, characters, and extras.

game.name: Marvel Ultimate Alliance
game.desc: When Doctor Doom assaults the SHIELD Helicarrier, an emergency call is sent to all available heroes. Why Doom would choose to make such a direct attack and draw the attention of the world's mightiest heroes is curious, but there's no time to contemplate the reasoning behind the attack. You must first punch things and make them explode. Questions can be asked later.

game.name: Max Payne
game.desc: The story is told in medias res and consists of three volumes: "The American Dream", "A Cold Day in Hell", and "A Bit Closer to Heaven". The game begins in the winter of 2001, as New York City finishes experiencing the worst blizzard in the history of the city. The intro sequence shows Max Payne, a renegade DEA agent and former NYPD officer, standing at the top of a skyscraper building as police units arrive. He then experiences a flashback from three years ago. Back in 1998, Max returned home to find that a trio of apparent junkies had broken into his house while high on a new designer drug called Valkyr. Max rushed to the aid his family, but was too late and his wife and their newborn daughter had already been brutally murdered. After his family's funeral, Payne transferred to the DEA. Three years later, Max Payne is employed as an undercover operative inside the Punchinello Mafia family responsible for the trafficking of Valkyr. His DEA colleague B.B. gives Max a message asking him to meet another DEA agent, who is also Max's best friend, Alex Balder, in the NYC Subway station. Max's arrival at the subway results in a shoot-out after he encounters mobsters working for Jack Lupino, a Mafia underboss in the Punchinello crime family, attempting a bank robbery by breaking through from the station. Working his way back to the surface, Max encounters Alex, who is then killed by an unknown assassin and Payne becomes the prime suspect in the murder. Additionally, the Mafia find out that he is a cop and now want him dead.

game.name: Maximum Chase
game.desc:
In this forever pursuit of a game, you play as a cop who has just got off duty. In a movie sequence you have a girl that gets in your car fleeing from a mob of mysterious people shooting, while you just got off duty. Little to know is this may be the destruction of Los Angeles.
This game has a storyline where you must run from all kinds of obstacles, cars, and people, through the entire game. Choose from 5 different cars, and shoot arcade style from a car while a girl drives.

game.name: Mechassault
game.desc: MechAssault was the first BattleMech video game published for the Xbox. Developed by Day 1 Studios and published by Microsoft, MechAssault was initiated when Denny Thorley of Day 1 Studios approached Jon Kimmich of Microsoft about developing an original BattleTech game built from the ground up to support console play.[1] "MechAssault" was released in November of 2002. A sequel, MechAssault 2: Lone Wolf, was released on December 28, 2004. Both games are set in the BattleTech fictional universe

game.name: Mechassault 2 : Lone Wolf
game.desc: MechAssault 2: Lone Wolf takes place roughly one year after the original MechAssault game. This is not a simple extension of the first game. There are a lot of new missions, vehicles (mechs, tanks, and whatever else the player can find), and worlds to explore. Jump in and let's go for a ride.

game.name: Medal of Honor : En PremiÃ¨re Ligne
game.desc: In Medal of Honor: Frontline, you play as Lt. Jimmy Patterson, a member of a special forces team. As a soldier during WW2, you must complete various missions and objectives. You will take part in the D-Day invasion of Normandy, seize the Nijmegen Bridge, infiltrate a weapons facility, sabotage a German U-Boat and more. You will have access to historically accurate weapons and equipment, such as pistols, rifles, and explosives. Parts of the game will have you working alongside other soldiers, which adds to the overall experience. Some missions require you to use stealth, where you must pose as a Nazi and show identification without giving yourself away.

game.name: Medal of Honor : Soleil Levant
game.desc: First-person shooter set in the Pacific theatre of WWII, beginning with the attack on Pearl Harbor and moving through the campaign with you playing as a young recruit chosen for various historical missions such as the raid on Guadalcanal. The game also makes efforts to educate players in WWII history and conditions, with period stock footage and images, and unlockable interviews with Pacific veterans.

game.name: Memorick : The Apprentice Knight
game.desc:
Arthurian legend comes alive as players take the role of Memorick, the young sword-wielding apprentice of Merlin. To Merlin's dismay, Memorick's interests were more vested in justice, honor, and knighthood than magical spells and wizardry. As Memorick players will defend his native land against the armies of Morganna, half-sister to King Arthur, and her son, Mordred.
The game features 19 levels to explore and a total of 26 monsters controlled by an AI system designed to offer real-time character animations combined with 3D environments and graphics. Four gameplay modes include flying a gryphon, riding a horse, sliding down on a shield, and walking/running as players try to vanquish the evil that shadows the land.

game.name: Men Of Valor
game.desc:
The creators of the original Medal of Honor take you back to explore the time of the Vietnam war. Playing as marine Dean Shepard, you travel through lush terrains and exotic landscapes to lead your AI controlled squad through jungles, tunnels and hooches while battling the North Vietnamese Army and the Viet Cong. To recreate a cinematic feel, the gameplay uses many scripted events and licensed sixties music.
If the single player campaign doesnât send you home in a body bag, you can mow down some friends in the fierce multiplayer action. Play both sides using weapons of their era, from M60s to RPDs in multiplayer class-based game types such as Search and Destroy, Recover the Documents, Frontline and the traditional DeathMatch.

game.name: Mercenaries: Playground of Destruction
game.desc: Anything goes in this Playground of Destruction. You are a lethal Mercenary. Your mission is to topple a sinister military regime by any means necessary. If it drives or flies, you can hijack it. If it shoots or explodes, you can use it as a weapon. You are free to go anywhere, destroy anything and blow the crap out of everything. In this playground of destruction, there are no limits, no barriers and no mercy.

game.name: Metal Arms : Glitch in the System
game.desc: Blast your way to victory as Glitch, the gun-slinging, half-ton menacing bot of Droid City. Found as scrap metal, but transformed into destructive machinery, Glitch is determined to free his people from the evil clutches of General Corrosive and his maniacal army of Mil bots. As you venture through 40 missions, you'll find 17 deadly weapons, a variety of vehicles, and enemy bots that you can control. Annihilate the General's sinister plan to dominate the world and salvage the robot race.

game.name: Metal Dungeon
game.desc: In the battle for world domination, the leaders of Giamel have begun producing Weapon Monsters, horrible biomechanical killing machines. The only ones with the power to produce such beings are the Gods of Magic, a group of sorcerers who have been captured and put into a trance so that their powers can be harvested for this end. However, the have started to awaken and now they are using these Weapon Monsters to wreak vengeance on those who kidnapped them. Their ultimate goal is the total destruction of the earth. You and your band of mercenaries are the only ones who can stop them.

game.name: Metal Gear Solid 2 Substance
game.desc: Metal Gear Solid 2: Substance is a re-vamped and revised edition of the original Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty, in which Solid Snake must recover the stolen Metal Gear Ray from a group of terrorists bent on using its power for unthinkable reasons. Along with the original espionage shooter comes a collection of 200 virtual reality (VR) missions. Missions range from killing certain targets and using particular weapons, as well as seeing the world of Solid Snake from different perspectives and styles, with first-person target modes and a variety mode including crazy characters of different shapes and sizes. Also included are various alternative missions, ranging from the protagonist sneaking around and snapping photos of targets to bomb disposal, all out destruction, and more.

game.name: Metal Slug 3
game.desc: In the third installment of the Metal Slug series, General Morden is back and he plans to establish a new world order. The player guides one of the heroes: Marco, Tarma, Eri, or Fio, as they blast their way through side-scrolling levels with a unique theme, filled with countless enemies and bosses. The player has to free hostages and can ride bizarre vehicles such as camels, elephants, tanks, and robots.

game.name: Metal Slug 4
game.desc: An organization called "Amadeus" wants to take over all the military computers in the world using a new virus they have created. It's your mission to destroy them before they accomplish their evil ambition.The 5th episode (including Metal Slug X) of the most famous arcade-shooting-series comes bringing the unaltered classic gameplay, a new arm (Dual Machine Gun), 6 new vehicles (Motorcycle, Truck, Bradley Tank, Metal Crow Tank, Four Legged Walkmachine and Forklift Truck) as well as 2 new soldiers for the pantheon (Nadia Cassel and Trevor Spacey).The most notable introduction to the series is the Metalish System, giving to the player a new possibility to score more points: after pick up certain shield-shape emblems, a timer bar will be displayed at the top of the screen. During this time, you must to shoot rapidly as many enemies as possible and, depending on your acting, you will receive a corresponding badge bonus that will be added to your score after completing it. But, if you die during the mission, the bonus will be lost.

game.name: Metal Slug 5
game.desc: The four mythical heroes of the series (Marco, Tarma, Eri and Fio) are back in Metal Slug 5 on Xbox. This time they are tracking down a criminal organisation that has stolen the plans for the next Metal Slug. Three new guns, two vehicles, and a new move called "slide" are the improvements of this fifth episode.

game.name: Midnight Club 3 : Dub Edition
game.desc: Midnight Club 3: DUB Edition continues the high-speed, open city racing tradition of its predecessors with the addition of the deepest car customization a game has ever had to the license plate(state,numbers) to the rim size. Unlike the international route of Midnight Club 2 (Los Angeles, Paris and Tokyo), racers will find themselves racing through three U.S. cities: San Diego, Atlanta and Detroit. Featuring over 60 licensed vehicles and are not limited to cars: SUVs, bikes, Classic muscle, Law Enforcement, and choppers are also in the mix.

game.name: Midnight Club 3 : Dub Edition Remix
game.desc: Midnight Club 3: Dub Edition Remix for Xbox is a nitro-powered car racing game. The title features ultra-fast city tracks in Atlanta, San Diego and Detroit with 8-player online competition. Drive the hottest licensed SUVs, import tuners, muscle cars, choppers and luxury cars. Then customise and boost them with every kit you can think of.

game.name: Midnight Club 3 : Dub Edition Remix
game.desc: Midnight Club 3: Dub Edition Remix for Xbox is a nitro-powered car racing game. The title features ultra-fast city tracks in Atlanta, San Diego and Detroit with 8-player online competition. Drive the hottest licensed SUVs, import tuners, muscle cars, choppers and luxury cars. Then customise and boost them with every kit you can think of.

game.name: Midnight Club II
game.desc:
Races consist of a series of checkpoints, represented by columns of light. In some races, the order in which the checkpoints must be cleared is prescribed. In this case, a transparent, glowing arrow points to the next checkpoint. In other races the checkpoints may be cleared in any order. In that case, the arrow points to the nearest checkpoint.
In-game screenshot of Midnight Club 2.It is up to the player which route to take from one checkpoint to the next. There are no artificial barriers in the game's open world environment that force the player to stay on a specific course. Any area that is drivable or jumpable in the free-roaming cruise mode between races may be used to get to the next checkpoint.

game.name: Midtown Madness 3
game.desc: This is wheel-to-wheel, pedal to the metal racing on two jam-packed cities. Paris and Washington DC will never be the same. Compete in 40 Blitz and Checkpoint races, "Work Undercover" through 54 mission. Go anywhere, do anything, race anyone - just make sure you get there first!

game.name: Midway Arcade Treasures
game.desc: This compilation of arcade games from the 1980's to the early 1990's includes: Spy Hunter, Defender, Defender II, Gauntlet, Joust, Joust 2, Paperboy, Rampage, Robotron 2084, Smash TV, Bubbles, RoadBlasters, Blaster Rampart, Sinistar, Super Sprint, Marble Madness, 720, Toobin', KLAX, SPLAT!, Satan's Hollow, Vindicators and Root Beer Tapper. This release also contains game histories, developer interviews, and documents. The Xbox version has an Xbox Live feature where players can rank their best high scores against other Xbox players.

game.name: Midway Arcade Treasures 2
game.desc: Midway Arcade Treasures 2 is a compilation that contains the following games: Mortal Kombat II, Mortal Kombat 3, Gauntlet II, Spy Hunter II, Xybots, NARC, APB, Cyberball , 072, Timber, Total Carnage, Pit Fighter, Wizard of Wor, Xenophobe, Primal Rage, Arch Rivals, Rampage World Tour, Kozmik Krooz'r, Championship Sprint, Hard Drivin' and Wacko. DVD content showing the origins of some of these games is also included.

game.name: Midway Arcade Treasures 3
game.desc: This is third Midway Arcade Treasures compilation released in as many years. This collection focuses on Midway and Atari racing games from the 1990s. The games in this collection include: San Francisco Rush: The Rock Alcatraz Edition, Hydro Thunder, Super Off Road, Badlands, Race Drivin', S.T.U.N. Runner, San Francisco Rush 2049 and Offroad Thunder. Some of the games in this collection are based on the home conversions, rather than emulation of the arcade originals.

game.name: Mike Tyson Heavyweight Boxing
game.desc: Mike Tyson Heavyweight Boxing is a boxing game released for Xbox. Eight international champions answered the call of boxing champion Mike Tyson and happily get in each other's faces in this hard-hitting game that reproduces the disfigured faces.

game.name: Minority Report
game.desc:
Based on the movie of the same name. You play John Anderton, the head of Pre-Crime. The game is a third person fighting/adventure game. You fight your way through Pre-crime cops and change your identity in an attempt to clear your name of pre-murder charges.
The game involves both hand-to-hand combat, the use of weapons and flying a jet pack. When fighting an opponent hand-to-hand there are multiple punch and kick combinations that can be used, these have greater effect on the opponent rendering them senseless quicker. Unconscious opponents can be picked up and then either hit some more or thrown.
Around the levels there are power-ups to collect such as health and cash, the health is used immediately to restore the player's character while the cash is used on the black market, accessed via the pause menu, to purchase new combat manoeuvres; permanent upgrades; temporary upgrades or weapons.

game.name: Mission : Impossible : Operation Surma
game.desc: Operation Surma is a stealth action game that puts the player in the role of the top-secret government agent Ethan Hunt, with settings based on the Mission Impossible movies. The story does not follow any of the movies, nor does the main character resemble Tom Cruise; however, everything else, from various gadgets and disguising is present. Following the story, the player will unfold many mysteries behind the ICE Worm virus developed by the Surma Corporation that makes them only one step to global domination, and will have to prevent that from happening using any means necessary.

game.name: Mlb Slugfest 2003
game.desc: MLB SlugFest 20-03 offers exaggerated, supercharged baseball action. Featuring real Major League Baseball players, teams, and stadiums, the game puts the emphasis on adrenaline and over-the-top plays. Enormous muscle-bound players take the field and perform incredible defensive plays, including acrobatic diving catches and turbo-powered throws. While at the plate, gamers can dig in and unleash mammoth blasts clear out of the park. The animations are detailed to the point where you can view players on the field chewing gum, talking to one another, and cheering for their teammates. The game sets the tone with an original baseball anthem, "Riot at the Bat Rack," performed by the heavy metal group Dry Kill Logic.

game.name: MLB SlugFest 20-04
game.desc: MLB SlugFest 2004 is an arcade-oriented baseball game for Xbox. It has all the humour of the series, and a very accessible gameplay. New secret teams appear such as the aliens, the Minotaurs and even Sub-Zero from the Mortal Kombat series!

game.name: Mlb Slugfest 2006
game.desc: MLB SlugFest 2006 on Xbox is a sports game, and not just any sports game: it's baseball. You will find all the official rules of this game in a title that integrates a player editor as well as all the usual modifications. It's up to you to play the bat to get the home run!

game.name: Mlb Slugfest Loaded
game.desc: MLB SlugFest Loaded is a baseball game for Xbox. The title takes a very arcade vision of the game, i.e. very aggressive games. Through 4 game modes (Quick Game, Franchise, Home Run Derby and Online Mode) and several more or less fancy environments, you can face the computer but also other players online or on the same console.

game.name: Monopoly Party
game.desc: Discover a variation of the famous board game in Monopoly Party on Xbox. Here you don't have to wait your turn to play, everyone plays at the same time on a classic game board or on one of the new interactive models. Monopoly Party can be played by up to 4 players simultaneously.

game.name: Monster 4x4 World Circuit
game.desc: Monster 4x4 World Circuit brings together brutal races, dangerous tracks and destructive machines in one game. Find all types of vehicles (sedans, ambulances, minis, cabs, racing cars...) that can be transformed into trucks in races with particularly winding routes.

game.name: Monster Garage
game.desc: Based on the TV show, this game takes various shows and lets you make the vehicle that was made on the shows. For those who do not know the TV show, it works like this... Jesse and his team are to build a creation that will do a certain task within 7 days and by spending under $3000 and the vehicle must look stock when completed. The challenges of this game are to stay under the $3000 when buying/selling parts and to complete the track at the end.

game.name: Mortal Kombat : Deadly Alliance
game.desc: Mortal Kombat: Deadly Alliance is a fighting game released for Xbox. Play as one of the 20 greatest and cruelest fighters and choose from 3 different fighting styles to choose which one suits you best. Don't forget to finish off your opponent with a bloody fatality.

game.name: Mortal Kombat : Deception
game.desc: Twenty-six characters are available to play in the game, with nine making their first appearance in the series. Deception contains several new features in the series, such as chess and puzzle games with the MK characters and an online mode. The Konquest Mode role-playing game (RPG) makes a return from Deadly Alliance, but follows the life of Shujinko, a warrior who is deceived by Onaga to search for artifacts to give Onaga more powers. In November 2006, Midway released Mortal Kombat: Unchained, a port for the PlayStation Portable, which adds new characters to the game.

game.name: Mortal Kombat : Shaolin Monks
game.desc: Mortal Kombat: Shaolin Monks on Xbox is an action game about the adventures of Liu Kang and Kung Lao following the first tournament of the same name. Through tables filled with blood and guts, you will have to overcome the hordes of Shang Tsung to bring peace on Earth. Many bonuses are to be unlocked, including the first Mortal Kombat fighting game.

game.name: Mortal Kombat Armageddon
game.desc: Mortal Kombat Armageddon on Xbox features no less than fifty fighters ready to fight for survival. Add to this a mode allowing you to create your character and fatalities and you have a bloody fighting game to match. Take part in the brand new Konquest mode and experience a fully scripted adventure.

game.name: Motocross Mania 3
game.desc: Motocross Mania 3 on Xbox is a motorbike racing game that features a lot of antics and jumps. Slip under the helmet of a patient biker and beat the crap out of your competitors. Motocross, there's no doubt about it, it's a merciless sport.

game.name: MotoGP : Ultimate Racing Technology 2
game.desc: MotoGP 2 is a motorbike racing game released on Xbox. The game features the official MotoGP license and races on 10 existing tracks. After beating the competition in single player, take on a friend in split screen multiplayer.

game.name: Mtv Music Generator 3
game.desc: MTV Music Generator 3 is a music creation software for Xbox. Focusing particularly on electronic music, the tool allows you to remix and cut up a dozen well-known tracks (Sean Paul, OutKast, Snoop Dogg...) and to compose your own rhythms.

game.name: Mtx Mototrax
game.desc: MTX Mototrax for Xbox is an arcade-oriented title that brings together three major events in the genre: Motocross, Supercross and Freestyle. Compete in the X-Games to push the limits of your machine. Fully customise your rider and tracks and use your bike's upgrade function to make it shoot flames.

game.name: Murakumo: Renegade Mech Pursuit
game.desc:
In Murakumo: Renegade Mech Pursuit, the player takes control of a mech pilot in control of the Murakumo, a mech in an elite unit designed to chase down a rebel mech army out to destroy the city of Oliver Port. The main goal of the game is to transverse the city in pursuit of a main rebel mech, destroying smaller enemies along the way and dodging varying obstacles. There are five different prototypes to choose from that carry weapons such as bazookas, sniper cannons and plasma swords.
There are 20 main missions to compete in, 10 more exclusive ones in the expert difficulty mode. Along with the story mode there is also a trial mode where the player can take on 10 different mech bosses solely for high rankings and a free mission mode where the player can redo previous missions in order to beat their previous records.

game.name: Mvp 06 Ncaa Baseball
game.desc: The makers of the highest-rated and top-selling baseball game of the past three years have created a completely new baseball experience: MVP 06 NCAA Baseball. Inspired by the spirit and emotion of collegiate athletics, MVP 06 NCAA Baseball is the first-ever college baseball game, changing the way baseball video games are played with the all-new Load and Fire Batting system. With the aid of the right analog stick and all-new swing types, take complete control of your swing - protect the plate with the mentality of a contact hitter or take aim at the cheap seats by swinging like a slugger. Featuring the top universities and conferences, battle your way to Omaha and enjoy the game like a kid again with MVP 06 NCAA Baseball.

game.name: Mvp Baseball 2003
game.desc: MVP Baseball 2003 is a baseball simulation for Xbox. Take charge of a team and take it to the top! The game features a variety of animations and truly immerses you in the atmosphere of the greatest games.

game.name: Mvp Baseball 2004
game.desc: MVP Baseball 2004 is a baseball simulation for Xbox. The game allows you to replay legendary games across 120 years of different franchises. Take control of a team and take it to the top! Various mini-games are available to relax alone or with others.

game.name: Mvp Baseball 2005
game.desc: MVP Baseball 2005 is a baseball simulation for Xbox. You can select several teams, in several divisions. Various mini-games are available to practice pitching and hitting the ball with the bat.

game.name: Mx 2002 Featuring Ricky Carmichael
game.desc: MX 2002 Featuring Ricky Carmichael is a racing game for Xbox. Choose from 30 riders, get on a motorbike and race through the 9 tracks available. Climb the career ladder and upgrade your bike.

game.name: Mx Superfly Featuring Ricky Carmichael
game.desc: MX Superfly featuring Ricky Carmichael is a racing game released for Xbox. There are 22 twisting tracks to choose from with the noble and beautiful goal of getting your bike into the air. But flying isn't enough, you'll also have to perform crazy tricks and move objects to create your park.

game.name: Mx Unleashed
game.desc: MX Unleashed is an arcade-oriented motocross game for Xbox. In Career or Freestyle mode, you can take part in forty or so races with speed, tricks, style and... crashes as the key words.

game.name: Mx Vs Atv Unleashed
game.desc: For the first time, the two categories MX and ATV are combined in an explosive game on Xbox and push the mix between simulation and madness towards limitless races. It's up to you to choose the right vehicle to win: motocross, 4x4, Quad, Monster Truck, buggy or even a bi-plane. You can also try to inflict the ultimate shame on your opponents by winning in a golf cart.

game.name: Mx World Tour
game.desc: MX World Tour on Xbox offers a fully customisable motocross experience. Each race features up to twelve riders competing in a Supercross (indoor) or Motocross (outdoor) event. Thirty tracks await you around the world. A four-player split-screen mode allows you to compete against your friends.

game.name: Myst III : Exile
game.desc: Myst III: Exile is an adventure and puzzle game for Xbox. Let yourself be surprised by this mythical adventure, where books are bridges between worlds and where the lessons of the past build your future. Each door you pass through, each book you open, leads you to a shattering destiny full of enigmas.

game.name: Myst IV : Revelation
game.desc: Myst IV: Revelation on Xbox is an adventure/thought game that takes you to the side of Atrus. This descendant of the D'ni people has locked his sons in ages, after they oppressed the people with an infamous dictatorship. It is now up to you to determine if these offspring are worthy of their father's forgiveness, by traversing ages filled with many riddles.

game.name: Namco Museum
game.desc: An archive of some of Namco's most popular retro games -- all on one disk.

game.name: Namco Museum 50th Anniversary
game.desc: Namco Museum 50th Anniversary on Xbox is a compilation that gathers, on the occasion of Namco's 50th anniversary, 14 of the titles that made the great days of the editor. Pac-Man, Ms. Pac-Man, Galaga, Galaxian, Dig Dug, Pole Position, Pole Position II, Rolling Thunder, Rally X, Bosconian, Dragon Spirit, Sky Kid, Xevious and Mappy are all in one box.

game.name: NASCAR 06 : Total Team Control
game.desc: Take control of the biggest teams in NASCAR competition in this team-based Xbox game. You can radio your teammates or take control of one of their cars to handle a tricky stretch in the middle of your rivals. The game includes the ability to give orders by voice.

game.name: Nascar 07
game.desc: NASCAR 07 on Xbox is a racing game based on the famous American license. The game is based on speed and excitement, and races take place on oval circuits where the slightest mistake can be destructive. It's up to you to take the necessary risks without throwing yourself off the track.

game.name: Nascar Thunder 2002
game.desc: NASCAR Thunder 2002 on Xbox allows you to take part in the famous American automobile competition by playing as one of the 35 official drivers of the 2001 season. Damage management, realistic environments... are on the agenda, all at the wheel of one of the 43 different vehicles.

game.name: Nascar Thunder 2003
game.desc: NASCAR Thunder 2003 allows you to experience the famous American automobile competition on Xbox. At the wheel of several dozen cars, the player embodies the greatest drivers of the moment and some great names of the past. The game allows you to experience a complete season, or an entire career that retraces 20 years of driving.

game.name: Nascar Thunder 2004
game.desc: NASCAR Thunder 2004 is a racing game for Xbox. You slip into high-powered cars to compete in thrilling races where you must learn to master the techniques of driving at very high speeds.

game.name: Nba 2k2
game.desc: NBA 2K2 is a basketball game for Xbox. You will find the teams and players of the 2001 NBA season. The game keeps the Street and Online modes of the previous versions. From a tactical point of view, the main novelty is the scoring management, much more complete.

game.name: Nba 2k3
game.desc: NBA 2K3 is a basketball game released for Xbox. Choose one of the best teams in the NBA and then compete in the indoor championship. You can also try your hand at street basketball by taking to the streets and playing in the changing weather.

game.name: Nba 2k6
game.desc: NBA 2K6 on Xbox is a full-featured basketball game with a multitude of different modes and options. Decide on the life of the next superstar with 24/7 mode, which allows you to create your own player from the ground up, and follow their development in the NBA. Take on teams in the streets, impose your style of play and earn money to buy music, jerseys, players...

game.name: Nba 2k7
game.desc: NBA 2K7 gives you the chance to be a legend on the court! Get the serious roundball action you crave and achieve NBA superstar status. With the industry leading online experience and unrivaled franchise control, NBA 2K7 is for any real fan. Seamless online play and the most comprehensive online features anywhere including complete online stat tracking, buddy lists management, and online leagues

game.name: Nba Ballers
game.desc: NBA Ballers is an arcade-oriented basketball game for Xbox. Make your rookie climb into the world's top basketball players, and win the many challenges available to you. Several other modes are also available, to play alone or with friends. Who will score the most spectacular dunk?

game.name: NBA Ballers : Phenom
game.desc: NBA Ballers: Phenom on Xbox gives you the opportunity to create your own basketball player and follow his career. Take part in tournaments and stroll around Venice Beach, Hollywood or Beverly Hills. Your actions are not without consequences and open up opportunities such as sponsorships.

game.name: Nba Inside Drive 2002
game.desc: NBA Inside Drive 2002 on Xbox is a basketball game that allows you to diversify your involvement. You participate in the game as a player, you trade players as a manager and you can coach by changing your game strategy. Of course, NBA teams are available for Seasons and Exhibition.

game.name: Nba Inside Drive 2003
game.desc: NBA Inside Drive 2003 offers intense gameplay, lively commentary, detailed arenas from the NBA, and music by MasterP. Game features allow the player to manage a team for 25 consecutive seasons. Track a player's skills from season to season. Create and customize a player from appearance to style of play. All aspects of the game of pro basketball is covered in this game. The announcers commentary accurately follows the pulse of the game and adds to the overall game experience. The AI of the players' hold true to the players' appearance in the game and in real life. Larger players will move more slowly and fatigue quicker than smaller players. So if you pull a jump shot on a shorter player you don't have to worry about poor AI allowing the shorter player a 5 foot vertical leap to block your shot. The AI is honest and accurate.

game.name: Nba Inside Drive 2004
game.desc: NBA Inside Drive 2004 est un jeu de basketball sorti sur Xbox. Ce jeu sous licence officielle de la NBA vous propose de jouer avec les vrais sportifs et de disputer le championnat amÃ©ricain officiel.

game.name: Nba Jam
game.desc: NBA Jam is a fun basketball game for Xbox. Unlike a simulation, NBA Jam is all about fun. You'll be able to do crazy dunks from one end of the court to the other or to get fired up when your player is really hot.

game.name: Nba Live 06
game.desc: NBA Live 06 on Xbox is a basketball simulation featuring the top teams in the American league as well as national teams. The title features a number of different game modes, as well as ultra-realistic movement breakdowns of some of the most talked-about players. The whole thing is a relatively realistic simulation of the big-time sport.

game.name: Nba Live 07
game.desc: NBA Live is a series of basketball video games, published by EA Sports. It is the successor to EA's previous NBA Playoffs and NBA Showdown series. Its main competitor is the NBA 2K series.

game.name: Nba Live 2002
game.desc: NBA Live 2002 on Xbox is a basketball simulation featuring the top teams in the American league as well as national teams. Participate in the championship, and improve your team by recruiting the best players of the moment.

game.name: Nba Live 2003
game.desc: NBA Live 2003 on Xbox is a basketball simulation featuring the top teams in the American league as well as national teams. Participate in the championship, and improve your team by recruiting the best players of the moment.

game.name: Nba Live 2004
game.desc: NBA Live 2004 is a basketball game released on Xbox. In addition to playing official NBA games in 3D, you can try your hand at club management thanks to the Dynasty mode in which you recruit players to train them.

game.name: Nba Live 2005
game.desc: NBA Live 2005 for Xbox is a basketball simulation featuring the top teams in the American league as well as national teams. Participate in the championship, and improve your team by tracking down interesting rookies and recruiting the best players of the moment. There are many modes to choose from, all of which are designed to be very realistic.

game.name: Nba Street V3
game.desc: NBA Street V3 on Xbox is a street basketball game featuring acrobatic tricks and ramshackle environments. Create your own basketball player, fully customise their gear and attributes, and you're off to 3-on-3 matches, tournaments and NBA-specific events.

game.name: Ncaa College Basketball 2k3
game.desc: Play as one of over 300 college hoops teams in this first college outing for the 2k lineup. Take control of a full coaching career from inception at a small time college working your way up to a major powerhouse performer. You can also play a skirmish with a friend, go out for a two-on-two game, or one of many other play modes you would expect in a competitive basketball game. Just don't play it like the NBA... the college game has a different, more team-oriented feel, and this comes through in the gameplay.

game.name: Ncaa College Football 2k3
game.desc: This is Sega Sports' collegiate football sim including brand-new player models, completely redesigned stadiums, all 25 official Bowl Championship Series (BCS) bowls, and a revamped Legacy mode in which gamers can recruit high-school stars and compare lifetime records against other collegiate programs in the historical rankings system. Using the game's Legacy mode, you will be able to follow the entire career of a college player from freshman year to entering the NFL draft.

game.name: Ncaa Football 06
game.desc: EA Sports 2005 edition of its college football franchise comes with some great new features and its new impact stick technology. As usual you can play a quick game or choose a dynasty, but it also includes the new Race for the Heisman mode as you start out as a Freshman, moving your way up through the college ranks, winning the big games and becoming a legend by winning the most covenant prize in college football, the Heisman Trophy. You can also play mini-games skills such as the Pass Skeleton, Oklahoma Drill, Option Attack and Rushing Attack and now with in studio commentary with Brad Nessler, Kirk Herbstreit and Lee Corso's famous mascot predictions just before kickoff. It has much improved graphics and an improvement over previous versions.

game.name: Ncaa Football 07
game.desc: The NCAA Football series allows you to experience this prestigious American football championship in a simulation by EA Games. Play as one of the official teams and compete against teams from every campus in America. This Xbox episode introduces a "Campus Legend" mode, as well as a new bonus called "Turn the Tide". The latter allows you to "boost" your players and your team momentarily when its gauge is full.

game.name: Ncaa Football 08
game.desc: NCAA Football 08 is a college football video game created by EA Sports, the sports video gaming subsidiary of Electronic Arts. It is the successor to NCAA Football 07 in the NCAA Football series. It was officially announced with the launch of the NCAA 08 page on the EA Sports website on February 20, 2007. EA Sports had opened up a ballot on their NCAA Football 07 site in which fans can vote on a feature to be implemented into the PlayStation 2 version, making it the first console announced for the game and announcing at least one of its features. Fans could vote for either in-game saves, medical red shirts, summer workouts or a lead blocker feature. The option of medical red shirts was voted on and won, and this option is on the Dynasty Mode on all versions of NCAA Football 08. This allows for players that are injured in the middle of the year to apply to gain another year of eligibility. The game was released on July 17, 2007, and the first time release on PlayStation 3, marking the eleventh installment of the NCAA Football series bearing the title "NCAA Football". As with NCAA Football 07, 08 features limited ESPN integration.

game.name: Ncaa March Madness 06
game.desc: NCAA March Madness 06 brings the American college basketball season to life on your Xbox. You will find all the game modes from the 2005 edition as well as gameplay improvements to make the game more fluid and complete once on the floor.

game.name: Need for Speed : Hot Pursuit 2
game.desc: Need for Speed: Endless Pursuit 2 is a racing game released for Xbox. Take the wheel of the most beautiful existing cars modeled entirely in 3D and drive the roads in search of speed. But watch out for the police who will do everything to stop you...

game.name: Need for Speed : Most Wanted
game.desc: Need for Speed: Most Wanted is a racing game on Xbox that offers you the opportunity to challenge the police through various chases. The goal here is to collect infractions while avoiding the police in order to top the list of most wanted drivers. Several types of cars are available (sports cars, supercars, muscle cars) and an open environment serves as a playground.

game.path: ./Games/Need For Speed Most Wanted Black Edition.iso
game.name: Need for Speed : Most Wanted
game.desc: Need for Speed: Most Wanted is a racing game on Xbox that offers you the opportunity to challenge the police through various chases. The goal here is to collect infractions while avoiding the police in order to top the list of most wanted drivers. Several types of cars are available (sports cars, supercars, muscle cars) and an open environment serves as a playground.
game.image: ./images/Need For Speed Most Wanted Black Edition-image.jpg
game.video: ./videos/Need For Speed Most Wanted Black Edition-video.mp4
game.marquee: ./images/Need For Speed Most Wanted Black Edition-marquee.png
game.thumbnail: ./images/Need For Speed Most Wanted Black Edition-thumb.png
game.fanart: ./images/Need For Speed Most Wanted Black Edition-fanart.jpg
game.manual: ./manuals/Need For Speed Most Wanted Black Edition-manual.pdf
game.boxback: ./images/Need For Speed Most Wanted Black Edition-boxback.png

game.name: Need For Speed Carbon
game.desc: Need for Speed Carbon is a racing game for Xbox. The title takes place in the beautiful city of Palmont City, where you are asked to become the king of asphalt and burn, by conquering the many districts of the city and accepting to participate in all the races and competitions that come your way. Of course, the police are on hand in case you break the law.

game.name: Need For Speed Underground
game.desc: Need for Speed Underground is an Xbox racing game that lets you model your car to your heart's content. Add bluish xenon headlights, a gleaming bonnet and a dash of nitro to your car, and take to the streets of the city in search of rivals. And don't forget to win the many challenges that come your way.

game.name: Need For Speed Underground 2
game.desc: The next installment in the Need for Speed Underground series takes you to a free-roaming city comprised of five neighborhoods. As you explore the city, you'll encounter rival racers who will show you all the hot spots in underground racing. After each race, you can improve your car's performance with various upgrades, ranging from the gear ratio to the suspension. The game includes more than 30 tuner cars from a variety of manufacturers, such as Mitsubishi, Nissan, Toyota, and more. You can even challenge racers from around the world in the game's online mode.

game.name: New Legends
game.desc: You are Sun Soo, a young noble fighting to free the Soo Kingdom and the rest of China from the tyranny of the evil Xao Gon. You beat up bad guys with melee weapon combos and guns. The artwork is a mixture of Chinese historical and gritty high-tech. Some locations are based upon scenic places in China.

game.name: Nfl 2k2
game.desc: NFL 2K2 is an American football simulation on Xbox that puts you in control of a football team. Take on the league's greatest teams after choosing your own from the NFL teams of 2001. A new passing system introduced in this version allows you to consider new tactics.

game.name: Nfl 2k3
game.desc: NFL 2K3 is an American football game released for Xbox. Whether you choose to be the manager of a famous team and win the league, or you decide to be in the middle of the action by playing one of the team members, the excitement of the sport will accompany you throughout the championship.

game.name: Nfl Blitz 2002
game.desc: NFL Blitz 2002 is a sports game released for Xbox. American football is already not known for its gentleness, but NFL Blitz 2002 goes even further by offering mainly action-oriented matches that leave little room for strategy. It's fast, it hurts and it's definitely arcade.

game.name: NFL Blitz Pro
game.desc: NFL Blitz Pro is an 11-on-11 licensed smash-mouth football videogame experience, delivering a new and sophisticated online feature set combined with its blend of lightning-fast, adrenaline-style gameplay. NFL Blitz has been reinvented, without leaving behind the edginess of the previous games in the series. For the first time, NFL Blitz Pro will showcase authentic 11-on-11 gameplay with realistic rules, features, and online play. New features also include a new Franchise mode, a reworked running game, and an improved AI.

game.name: Nfl Fever 2002
game.desc: NFL Fever 2002 is an American football game for Xbox. Play with the 31 NFL teams of the year 2001. Try to reach the Super Bowl by any means possible. Play a full season with your favourite team. As you progress, the players' stats change. Create your dream team by drafting your favorite players in Dynasty mode.

game.name: Nfl Fever 2003
game.desc: NFL Fever 2003 is a sports game released for Xbox in which American football is at your fingertips. Experience the intensity of each game with the official NFL teams and play up to 4 players on the same machine or on the Internet with Xbox Live.

game.name: Nfl Fever 2004
game.desc: NFL Fever 2004 is an American football game released for Xbox. Enter the heart of the stadium to try to score as many touchdowns as possible. In addition to winning the cup solo, compete with up to 4 friends on the same console, or on Xbox Live.

game.name: Nfl Head Coach
game.desc: NFL Head Coach is a National Football League video game that was released on June 20, 2006 for the PlayStation 2, Xbox and PC. The game allows the player to control an NFL team and become the greatest coach in NFL history. It features then-Pittsburgh Steelers head coach Bill Cowher on the cover.

game.name: Nfl Street
game.desc: NFL Street is an arcade-oriented American football game for Xbox. The title is original in that it proposes to play in the street. There are no reprimands, so you can do almost anything to win. In addition to offering teams composed of hundreds of NFL stars, the game offers the possibility of imposing your style through 4 different game modes.

game.name: Nfl Street 2
game.desc: NFL Street 2 on Xbox is an American football game that breaks away from the conventional framework of the sport to take a much more crazy approach. Whether it's in an urban environment or on a deserted field, the goal remains the same: to cross the opponent's line at all costs to score a touchdown.

game.name: Nhl 2002
game.desc: NHL 2002 is a video game released by EA Sports in 2001. It is the predecessor to NHL 2003. The game's cover man is Pittsburgh Penguins superstar and owner Mario Lemieux, who had just made a stunning comeback after being retired for three and a half years. It was the first installment of the NHL series to be released on Xbox.

game.name: Nhl 2003
game.desc: In order to become a superstar in the NHL, you'll need a combination of speed, power, and moves. NHL 2003 gives you the abilities of all the stars and teams of pro hockey, but it's up to you to master them. This time, you have full control of the puck with Dynamic Deke Control and accurate puck physics. The game also features four game modes, including Create-a-Player, enhanced sounds and animations, and dynamic camera work to bring you closer to the NHL action.

game.name: Nhl 2004
game.desc: NHL 2004 is an ice hockey simulation released on Xbox. The game allows you to play as the manager of a national team or to put on your own skates and play with the puck.

game.name: Nhl 2005
game.desc:
NHL 2005 features Open Ice Control, which according to EA allows better control, including moving players without the puck and also a complete World Cup mode where each team can be created from scratch. For the first time, the user was allowed to import digitized home arenas for the scratchbuilt teams (the 30 NHL arenas plus Nuremberg Arena, KÃ¶lnarena, Stockholm Globe Arena, Helsinki Hartwall Areena and Prague Sazka Arena were available). Additional NHL jerseys and logos were also available including those of the defunct Atlanta Flames, Winnipeg Jets, Colorado Rockies (NHL), Quebec Nordiques as well as the old style Los Angeles Kings, Washington Capitals and Vancouver Canucks uniforms of the 1970s and the 1980s.
The IIHF license which granted the World Cup mode also allowed EA to use real-life international jerseys for the only time (previously released games used unique jerseys designed by the game's staff which only bore a passing similarity to their real life counterparts, so the jersey shows their flag.) The PC version of the game was stripped down to the bare essentials, including the omitting of the create-a-player feature. These omissions were possibly due to the labour dispute that season, but EA explained that they hadn't perfected the new create-a-player interface, which would have allowed for far greater customizability than what was previously available.

game.name: Nhl 2k3
game.desc: NHL 2K3 is an ice hockey game released for Xbox. Experience the unique style of ESPN as you play hard-hitting hockey matches or opt for team management in the associated mode.

game.name: Nhl 2k6
game.desc: With NHL 2K6 on Xbox, take control of the ice with top-notch skating, puck handling, checking and stopping. Join the sport's great teams for some hard-hitting battles. But also take care to control the training and atmosphere between players to gain efficiency.

game.name: Nhl 2k7
game.desc: NHL 2K7 is an ice hockey game for Xbox. The title takes its full scope thanks to the wide range of controls that can be performed to be as faithful as possible to reality. The software also offers a choice of national teams to play against the NHL's elite. There are also numerous mini-games and a very extensive online mode.

game.name: Nhl Hitz 2002
game.desc: NHL Hitz 2002 is a hockey game for Xbox. Put on your skates and your protections because hockey is not a sport of any rest you must constantly tackle or avoid your opponents if you want to reach the goal. The game is arcade oriented and allows you to do many things that are not possible in normal circumstances. NHL Hitz 2002 can be played by up to 6 players.

game.name: Nhl Hitz 2003
game.desc: The NHL Hitz series has been on all next-generation consoles since the early days of the 32-bit era. With that said, its no surprise that Midway brings NHL Hitz 20-03 to GameCube, with Hitz' trademark 'On-Fire Mode', over-the-top animations, and fully 3D crowds. Like all NHL Hitz games, NHL Hitz 20-03 features gameplay modes for up to 6 players, in-game fights and hidden teams, players and stadiums. The game will also feature Create-A-Player modes and mini-games.

game.name: Nhl Rivals 2004
game.desc: NHL Rivals 2004 on Xbox is a simulation-based ice hockey game. Recruit and sell a number of players and know how to set up the best tactics to win the many games you have to play in order to climb the NHL rankings at the head of your team.

game.name: Nickelodeon Party Blast
game.desc: Nickelodeon Party Blast is a party game for Xbox featuring characters from the Nickelodeon channel. Play with SpongeBob, Jimmy Neutron, the Razmoket and many others. The software offers 5 game types with many levels. Nickelodeon Party Blast is a 4 player title.

game.name: NightCaster II : Equinox
game.desc: NightCaster II: Equinox is an action/adventure game for Xbox that features two characters. In order to accomplish your quest you have at your disposal more than 32 spells from 4 different schools: fire, water, light and darkness. A cooperative multiplayer mode is also included.

game.name: Ninja Gaiden
game.desc: Ninja Gaiden develops its narrative thread through the actions of its player-controlled protagonist, Ryu Hayabusa. Viewed from a third person over-the-shoulder perspective, in typical action-adventure fashion Ryu starts the game with basic, low-level abilities and weapons that can be upgraded as he progresses, by discovering or buying items. In keeping with his ninja persona, his character can interact with the game environment to perform acrobatic feats, such as running along and jumping off walls, swinging from pole to pole, or running across water.

game.name: Ninja Gaiden Black
game.desc:
Ninja Gaiden Black and Ninja Gaiden Sigma. The game follows the fictional story of Ryu Hayabusa, a master ninja, in his quest to recover a stolen sword and avenge the slaughter of his clan.
Tecmo specifically targeted Ninja Gaiden at a non-Japanese audience, and despite difficulties in obtaining content ratings due to the game's graphic depictions of violence, it was generally well received, and 362,441 copies were sold in North America in the first month after its release. Nevertheless, the game had to be censored for release in some regions, and Japanese sales were poor, with only 60,000 in the four months following its release. Making use of the Xbox's internet connectivity, Ninja Gaiden was the focus of a series of online contests across North America, Europe and Japan. Record-breaking numbers of players took part, competing for places in the live final, which was held during the Tokyo Game Show (TGS) 2004.
Team Ninja continued to update the game after its release: two Hurricane Packs were made available as free downloadable content that added extra content, gameplay challenges, and game engine improvements.[1] These were incorporated into a reworked version, released in 2005 and entitled Ninja Gaiden Black, that was regarded by the game's creator Tomonobu Itagaki and many players as the definitive version. In 2007, Ninja Gaiden was graphically enhanced on the PlayStation 3, with extra content, in the form of Ninja Gaiden Sigma. This version was later released on the PlayStation Vita as Ninja Gaiden Sigma Plus.

game.name: Obscure
game.desc:
Something is very wrong at Leafmore High. The entire school has turned dark and foreboding, strange sounds echo in the halls, and several people have mysteriously gone missing. One group of brave teens decides to find out what's going on... no matter what. They have no idea what kind of horrors have gripped the school and everyone in it. In the darkness, the evil has power... but add light and they can be defeated. Will they survive the night ahead?
In Solo Mode, choose from 5 characters with different personalities, aptitude and perspectives. Change between them at any time (as long as they are still alive).
The player can also select a second person (as a "teammate") to accompany the player by going to a "gathering point" in the game. At any time during play, the player can switch control between the first character and the second, thereby accessing their special talents.
There are several basic types of weapons used in the game: contact (a baseball bat for instance), pistols, guns, and more exotic, high-powered "special" weapons. Ammunition is specific for each gun or pistol and is not interchangeable. Weapons can be swapped between characters and ammunition found is stored in the group's reserves for sharing amongst them.

game.name: Oddworld : Munch's Oddysee
game.desc: Munch is a lonely Gabbit - a gentle frog-like creature who communicates with other members of its species through echolocation. Munch searches in vain for others of his kind: his entire race has been exterminated, since the Gabbit eggs ("gabbiar") is a delicacy, and their lungs have been used by the chain-smoking, powerful Glukkons to replace their own. The last of the Gabbits is captures by two Vykkers, owners of Vykkers Labs, where they conduct experiments on living creatures. The two implant a sonar device in Munch's head, concocting a plan to enslave him and use him to trap other animals. However, Munch discovers that the implant has given him new powers; using those, he begins to free the vicious Fuzzles, whom the Vykkers have been using in their laboratories, hoping to escape himself and help other creatures who suffer under the yoke of the Glukkons. Munch's Oddysee is set in the fictional Oddworld universe; its events take place after those of Abe's Exoddus. The player controls Munch as well as Abe, the hero of the previous Oddworld games. Abe's abilities haven't changed much since the last installment: as before, GameSpeak must be used to communicate with other creatures, leading them to safety. His fellow Mudokons can now be ordered to attack enemies. Abe can also grab and toss Mudokons or Munch to lead them to area they cannot access otherwise. Possessing enemies also comes into play, and is needed to solve many of the puzzles. Possession abilities can now be used to ignite quarrels between enemies and make them fight each other.

game.name: Oddworld : Stranger's Wrath
game.desc: A bounty hunter known only as the Stranger is pursuing and capturing various criminals, trying to earn enough money for a mysterious operation. When he hears that a town populated by Grubbs has been invaded by a demon, the Stranger ventures there. The town was once protected by a race of creatures known as the Steef, who now appear to be completely extinct. The Stranger soon discovers that a nearby river has been dried up by a dam, built by a person called Sekto. The Stranger must confront this person as he continues to hunt down outlaws, revealing nothing about his past. Oddworld: Stranger's Wrath is set in the fictional Oddworld universe, differing in many ways from the preceding installment. The game incorporates two basic genres: third-person platforming action and first-person shooter. The player can switch between the modes at any time by using a melee or a ranged weapon, respectively. The goal of the game, for the most part, is to bag the outlaws and bring them in, collecting "moolah" (the game's currency) in the process. The Stranger can stun or knock down enemies, as well as use a stealthy approach, e.g. hiding in long grass to surprise the enemy.

game.name: Open Season
game.desc: In this game the player takes the role of Boog, a domesticated bear who tries to return to the civilization after being released in a nearby forest due to an unfortunate misadventure, and Elliot, a crazy, one-horned deer who desires to be Boog's partner. In order to achieve his goal, Boog will have to prove himself to the creatures of the forest by helping them to get rid of the hunters. By gaining their respect, Boog will be able to convince the creatures to help him reach his hometown. Open Season is a third-person view action game based on Sony Animation Studios' first movie. The player controls the main character in the forest and uses the different forest creatures to resolve simple puzzles (considering the target age for the game) by throwing them. The player can collect "achievement points" (not related to the Xbox 360 Achievement points) that will unlock new abilities for Boog.

game.name: Operation Flashpoint : Elite
game.desc: Operation Flashpoint: Elite is a port of the original Operation Flashpoint and its expansion Resistance for Xbox, but adds some additional content. It also includes individual single missions, a mission editor and co-op or competitive online play over Xbox Live. Operation Flashpoint: Elite is a realistic soldier simulation where players get to control both individual soldiers, full squads and various vehicles including helicopters and tanks. In total, the campaigns contain more than 60 missions. Through Xbox Live, 50 multiplayer missions are available.

game.name: Otogi : Myth Of Demons
game.desc: Otogi: Myth of Demons is a third-person action game which lets you play as Raikoh. Once a mighty warrior, he has been resurrected by a mysterious princess to free Japan of an army of demons and is held in the world of the living by her powers. Battle your enemies with either your sword, your magic, or both, and buy new weapons, spells and other items between missions to better your performance. The battle system, while simple at its roots, lets you execute a number of combinations of basic, heavy, spell, and dash attacks to strike at your enemies. Since Raikoh can stay long in mid-air and even rise up higher by executing certain slashes, fights take place in all three directions of the area.

game.name: Otogi 2 : Immortal Warriors
game.desc: Otogi 2: Immortal Warriors combines fantasy with real life folklore and fast paced action. It starts where its predecessor ended and this time Raikoh, the hero of the first game, is not alone. Five new warriors join him and combine their powers to tackle the task of saving the world from a new demonic threat. Gameplay is pretty much your regular hack & slash, and there is lots of it. The player advances through levels, destroying huge amounts of mystical enemies with different attacks, both physical and magical, while collecting experience which lets one improve the skills of the characters. New weapons and accessories can be purchased from a store between levels. Challenge levels separate from the main game open up as levels are completed, such as ones that task you wish surviving against a never ending horde of monsters, or destroying 100 arches in a limited time. Almost everything in the game's levels are destroyable, from trees to buildings, and the six playable characters are all different so one level might be easier to complete with one character than the other.

game.name: Outlaw Golf
game.desc: Golf meets strippers, ex-cons, and wannabe rappers. In Outlaw Golf, you can step into the shoes of all kinds of criminals and compete in 30 tour events. With each event, you'll unlock new characters and better equipment and improve your character's skills. Challenge three of your friends in eight different games, including stroke, match, skins, best ball, casino, and more. Play like a pro and the game gets easier; play poorly and the game becomes tougher.

game.name: Outlaw Golf : 9 Holes Of X-Mas
game.desc: It's the holidays and here are 9 all-new holes for the holidays. A small taste of Outlaw Golf but on slippery slopes, frozen greens, and other cold wintery conditions to challenge you on these courses.

game.name: Outlaw Golf : 9 More Holes Of X-Mas
game.desc: A Blockbuster Video Exclusive release. This is another 9 holiday holes of Outlaw Golf like last year's Outlaw Golf: Holiday Golf. This time it's Summer and Trey in their holiday dress playing on 9 never-before seen courses. This short version has all the clubs unlocked, so use that bigger stick.

game.name: Outlaw Golf 2
game.desc: The crude cast of Outlaw Golf is back with new friends, courses, fighting moves, and more. Choose from 11 wild characters--including babes, rappers, and thugs--and take on the challenges from eight courses, ranging from the arctic to the jungle. By playing through the tour and winning events, you can unlock more clubs, balls, and outfits. In addition to tournament mode, the game features match, time attack, and baseball golf modes. Just remember--even if your golf game is off, you can still beat up your opponents, or even your caddy.

game.name: Outlaw Tennis
game.desc: The Outlaw gang is back, this time to take on the world of Tennis. The game features all your favorite characters from the previous Outlaw games and adds a few new ones for a total of 16 playable characters. Like the other Outlaw games, there are a number of unlock-able items including new characters, racquets, balls, courts and mini-games and a hard rock soundtrack. The game follows the traditional rules of tennis and adds the unique humor and special features common to the series including player fights, exploding balls, changing weather, character improvements, outfits and other accessories. There are 6 game modes including: Exhibition, Tour (50 Tour Matches - Singles, Doubles & Canadian Doubles mixed), Random Play, Drills and Network play. Special matches include Classic, Hot Potato, Casino, Baseball, Football, Pinball and Ping Pong which are similar in nature to the other games in the series.

game.name: Outlaw Volleyball
game.desc: Outlaw Volleyball is the second game in Simon & Schuster's growing Outlaw franchise. As the title suggests, you play various games of volleyball with shady and dirty characters, from a slutty biker to an ex con to a pair of strippers. There are sixteen players in total. Each character has his or her own unique personality, strengths and weaknesses. There are four different modes you can compete in; Exhibition, which is a standard volleyball game, Tour, which is the career mode that spans fifty different events, and Drills, which are sort of like practice games that awards points you can use to improve your player's abilities. The fourth mode is Xbox Live enabled, allowing you to play with people over the Xbox Live service. There are ten different courts to play on, each one with it's own backgrounds and animation. You can play on a beach, at a carnival, or even in a prison. Outlaw Volleyball utilizes the same momentum feature first seen in Outlaw Golf, which allows you to earn "beating tokens" that you can spend on beating up the other team. If you are doing lousy, beating up a member of the other team refills your momentum meter, allowing you to come back and possibly win.

game.name: Outlaw Volleyball : Red Hot
game.desc: A Blockbuster Video Exclusive game for the 2003 Halloween season. This acts like a demo for those not familiar with Outlaw Volleyball and has some new features for those who are. Some of the new items: Halloween costumes for many of the female characters and a new court.

game.name: OutRun 2
game.desc: Arcade style racing action meets challenge based skills driving. Driving between different zones to reach the finish point with choices of which route to take along the way means you can select the difficulty along the way. This is the sequel to the original arcade classic and has a very similar style graphically and gameplay.

game.name: OutRun 2006 : Coast 2 Coast
game.desc: Like its predecessors, OutRun 2006 is an old-school arcade racer, which means that your cars don't have realistic physics, don't get damaged and have insanely fast speed. Since this title is officially licensed by Ferrari, you drive with 15 original models from the DINO 246 GTS over the F430 to the all-new Enzo Ferrari. The heart of the game is the Coast 2 Coast mode in which you race against up to 5 AI players on 15 US themed tracks. In addition you have to impress different girlfriends. She tells you what she wants to see (a hard slide around a curve or a close take-over for example) and you have to perform it to win her heart.

game.name: Over The Hedge
game.desc: Over the Hedge is based on the movie with the same name. Verne and his woodland family wake-up from their winter slumber to find an ominous green wall in neck of the woods. In their amazement to find out what this endless wall is about, RJ the raccoon is more than happy to help them. The woodland friends have never seen humans before so RJ is eager to show them what humans have to offer. RJ is quick to show them the valuable treasures humans - stockpiles of food. Playing as RJ, Verne, Hammy, or Stella you go on missions to get FOOD. You also of course want to take back your neighborhood but that pesky Rancho Camelot Estates Homeowners Association President, Gladys Sharpe, is dead set on getting rid of you. She hires Dwayne the exterminator to use his tactics and gadgets to get rid of the likes of you.

game.name: Pac-man World 2
game.desc: Long ago, back in medieval times, an evil spirit known as Spooky had terrorized all of Pac-Land. In response to this, the great Wizard Pac created a potion that turned 5 ordinary fruit into the "Golden Fruit." A young knight called Sir Pac-alot fought and sealed Spooky underneath a large tree using the Golden Fruit, which were attached to the branches of the tree. In the present time late at night, Inky, Pinky, Blinky and Clyde sneak into the village and, in their mischief, pick the Golden Fruit off the tree in the center of town. Unfortunately, this has released Spooky from his prison. Spooky tells the ghosts to take the Golden Fruit and follow him if they wish to rid the land of the Pac-people forever. When Pac-Man awakes, he hears the news from Professor Pac about the Golden Fruit and Spooky, and sets off to defeat the ghosts and Spooky.

game.name: Pac-man World 3
game.desc: The classic gaming character Pac-Man is back for the third iteration of the Pac-Man World series. The game features the classic Pac-Man powers and adds a few new abilities--such as superstomp and electric shock--to assist the yellow-ball-like hero against his ghost foes.

game.name: Painkiller : Hell Wars
game.desc: You play as Daniel Garner, a seemingly regular guy who as just been killed in a horrific car accident. Trapped in a dark and unwelcoming world between heaven and hell, you struggling to uncover the reasons why you've been denied entry into heaven. Awaiting your purification, you must fight through a seemingly endless number of demon soldiers as you to attempt to stop an imminent unholy war.

game.name: Panzer Dragoon Orta
game.desc:
The fourth installment of the Panzer Dragoon series has you playing Orta, a young girl who has been imprisoned by the Empire. Under a wave of attack, the prison camp is broken through by a mysterious dragon, and Orta takes it upon herself to ride the dragon, and destroy the Empire once and for all. Along the way, she will also discover her own destiny, and the mystery surrounding her new friend.
Simply put, you have limited control of the dragon for most of the game, as your trigger finger will be shooting non-stop at the enemies that fly around the area. Orta will be your main source of fire-power when you simply press the fire button, but by pressing and holding, the aim cursor will change, allowing you to fire a burst of power from the dragon at whatever the cursor aims at.
The dragon itself can change into three forms at a press of a button. Each form has a different style of attack and power ability.
A port of the original Panzer Dragoon is included.

game.name: Peter Jackson's King Kong
game.desc: Jack Driscoll, scriptwriter, follows director Carl Dernham and actress Ann Darrow to Skull Island where Dernham intends to film his next movie. But primeval creatures await them: giant insects, dinosaurs, and King Kong. Based on Peter Jackson's 2005 remake, King Kong lets you play as Jack Driscoll and Kong himself. Jack's levels are HUDless FPS levels set on Skull Island. Jack must use a variety of weapons, traps, and fire to kill or repel Skull Island's fauna. Kong's levels are third-person brawlers set on Skull Island and New York City, where Kong must puzzle his way through environmental obstacles and thrash his opponents.

game.name: Phantasy Star Online Episode I&II
game.desc: The epic Phantasy Star Online gets revamped for the Nintendo GameCube. Both the Sega Dreamcast titles, Phantasy Star Online and Version 2, are included plus an exclusive new adventure, dungeons, enemies, new rare items and more.nnnnPhantasy Star Online allows up to 4 players to co-operate online or on the one GameCube console in an adventure spanning countless fantasy battles in highly detailed worlds. Four players can also play a range of different mini-game types including Battle Mode and Challenge Mode.

game.name: Phantom Crash
game.desc: In the wake of massive air pollution and economic disaster in Tokyo, Japan has relocated its capital. Old Tokyo has become the battleground for a new breed of public entertainment called Rumbling. Observing from a massive airborne viewing station, spectators watch Scoobees battle to the death. More than just high-speed, heavily armed Mechs, Scoobees have an unprecedented stealth capability, turning invisible at will for brief periods of time. The stakes are high. The enemies are ruthless. The action is intense. Are you ready to rumble.

game.name: Phantom Dust
game.desc: Xbox action game Phantom Dust is set in a post-apocalyptic world where strange dust has fallen from the sky wiping everyone's memory. A group of humans who have developed supernatural powers, the Espers, have discovered two bodies in hibernation pods. One of the two is named Edgar, and could hold crucial information on ghost dust. The other is you.

game.name: Pirates of the Caribbean
game.desc: Pirates of the Caribbean is a role-playing game in which the player takes the role of a pirate who has to grow in skill by fighting, trading and solving quests. The player can buy and upgrade a ship, sign-up a crew, and try to rule the seas of the Caribbean.

game.name: Pitfall Harry : L'ExpÃ©dition Perdue
game.desc: Pitfall Harry: The Lost Expedition is a platform game for Xbox. Dive into the heart of the jungle as Pitfall Harry, a daring explorer, and try to save the members of a lost expedition. You'll have to foil the evil plans of a high priest and stop your eternal rival from taking the treasures of El Dorado. Mercenaries, crocodiles and scorpions are among the enemies you must face.

game.name: Playboy : The Mansion
game.desc: Ah, playmates in languid and lascivious poses... The famous magazine with the rabbit will have made many drool with envy. Playboy: The Mansion on Xbox is immersive in its own way, as this management game offers you the chance to take control of the magazine from the beginning. Assisted by a journalist and a photographer, you have to organise parties in your domain to attract the pin-ups and convince them to go for an interview, or even more... nn

game.name: PocketBike Racer
game.desc: Mini motorcycles in the King's garden. Jump on a pocketbike and let 'er rip in this budget title from Burger King. Pocketbike's are small motorcycles that go really really fast. In Pocketbike Racer you get to choose from various Burger King characters including; The King, Brooke Burke, Subservient Chicken and Whopper Jr along with a biker and some generic humans.

game.name: Power Drome
game.desc: In the distant future, the space colonies have found their favourite pastime: organising races on board of machines speeding along narrow circuits. If the principle of Power Drome on Xbox smells a bit old-fashioned, it offers in return a well-felt inertia management as well as a rather high number of courses.

game.name: Predator : Concrete Jungle
game.desc: The game begins in large urban area. The night is young and a heat wave has spread across the city. A light rain sprinkles the ground as a large figure jumps across the roof tops, landing with the massive thumps of a large inhuman creature. The Predator has been wounded and now seeks to return to his ship before the humans find him and kill him. Thus is the opening for Predator: Concrete Jungle.

game.path: ./Games/Prince of Persia - The Sands of Time.iso
game.name: Prince of Persia : The Sands of Time
game.desc: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time is a platform/action game for Xbox. You play as the young prince who makes the mistake of opening an evil hourglass that immediately condemns the souls of the palace's inhabitants. The diabolical Vizier is once again behind it all, and it is by wandering the palace assisted by Farah that the player must put an end to the curse.
game.image: ./images/Prince of Persia - The Sands of Time-image.jpg
game.marquee: ./images/Prince of Persia - The Sands of Time-marquee.png
game.thumbnail: ./images/Prince of Persia - The Sands of Time-thumb.png

game.manual: ./manuals/Prince of Persia - The Sands of Time-manual.pdf
game.boxback: ./images/Prince of Persia - The Sands of Time-boxback.png

game.name: Prince Of Persia : Warrior Within
game.desc: Hunted by Dahaka, an immortal incarnation of Fate seeking divine retribution, the Prince embarks on a new journey on a cursed island.
